boil_water.instructions: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil on high heat

put_in_pasta.instructions: Put the pasta in the water and stir. Turn off heat

make_sauce_1.instructions: Put the cream in a saucepan, cook on medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally

make_sauce_2.instructions: Add pepper to the sauce and continue to cook for 5 more minutes

recipes.name: Katie's Garlic Ginger Lemon Honey Tea

slice_ingredients.instructions: Bring 3 cups of water to a boil on high heat

boil_water.instructions: Put the ingredients in the water and stir. Turn off heat
